featured.course_description: Learn Forex gives you a solid grounding in everything you need to start your trading journey. We'll teach you the fundamental skills of how you trade and show you how to use SmartCharts.
featured.name: Learn Forex

featured.course_description: If you are now used to trading Forex, you might want to diversify into trading other assets. This course will show you how to do that. We'll take you through the differences and similarities in trading assets like Stock Indices, metals or oil so that you can broaden the assets you trade.
featured.name: Learn Stock Indices & Commodities

featured.course_description: With two webinars everyday on most trading days, these webinars will give you our coaches view on how to analyse the markets and to recognise patterns in the market that you might decide to trade on. Our coaches will take you through multiple currency pairs and point out technical analysis that you can apply yourself.
featured.name: Webinars
